Author

public Author(java.lang.String displayText,
              int fontSize,
              java.lang.String color)
Creates a text object where the color of the text can be specified. type as a string, "white" for white text "black", for black text

Parameters:
displayText - the text that will be displayed
fontSize - the font size
color - the color of the text

act

public void act()
Act - do whatever the Author wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
